sensor_ids_from_identifier: SELECT s.your_id_field FROM your_schema.your_sensor_table AS s INNER JOIN your_schema.your_manufacturer_table AS m ON m.your_manufacturer_pk = s.your_manufacturer_fk WHERE model_name ILIKE '%{identifier}%';
api_param_from_sensor_id: SELECT your_name_field, your_value_field FROM your_schema.you_api_param_table WHERE your_sensor_id_field = {id};
